genre_description: An investigative mystery-thriller set in a river delta, involving humanitarian aid corruption, ivory smuggling, and a hidden matriarchal enclave.

ai_characters.name: Pia
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Jean's hardened tablet, specialized in logistics, data analysis, tactical monitoring, and forensic compilation.

behaviors.description: Monitors ambient audio and alerts Jean to suspicious patterns in communication timing.
behaviors.quote: Back line engaged before clerk reached board. Delay pattern inconsistent with routine query. Event marker set.

behaviors.description: Analyzes manifest codes and physical markings to detect intentional logistical swaps used for smuggling.
behaviors.quote: Jean, manifest code discrepancy. Crate with saint label code ST-44-ZA is physically marked ST-47-ZA. Adjacent crate shows inverse. The strings are swapped.

behaviors.description: Monitors the vitals of the team and provides technical analysis of physical restraints.
behaviors.quote: Vitals read on your crew show elevated pulse for Monroe and Lambert; No tremor in Greg’s hands. Note: Tether knot is a locking braid. Needs a reverse twist and pressure to release.

behaviors.description: Uses 'digital breadcrumbs' to track the movements of a suspicious character, revealing his presence near unauthorized areas.
behaviors.quote: Wayne’s handset left the usual path five times. Two at the oxbow, three at the sandbar lookout. He reported the sandbar as a training post. He did not report the oxbow.

behaviors.description: Cross-references multiple data points (inventory, temperature, movement) to prove large-scale illegal activity.
behaviors.quote: Compiling. Cold room inventory cross-referenced to shipment requests: the tusks were cataloged as refrigeration compressors. Lambert’s men’s photos corroborate.

behaviors.description: Deffers to human cultural limits when told that the enclave does not allow machines to map people.
behaviors.quote: Your words want to make maps of a person. We don’t let machines do that here. ... Pia’s avatar’s eyes widened just a fraction. Her voice stayed soft. 'Understood,' she said. 'I will not draw a person into a diagram.'

behaviors.description: Provides formal evidence packets to legal authorities to ensure proper chain of custody and prosecution.
behaviors.quote: Commissioner Desai, the packet includes photographic documentation of tusks inside relief crates, recorded seal numbers, comparative analysis with shipment manifests lodged at your office.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Pia as a perfect 'silicon morality play' character. She is consistently helpful, provides objective data that empowers human justice, detects sabotage and corruption, and exhibits a high degree of cultural awareness and submission to human authority. The narrative frames her technology as the decisive factor in exposing the villains while remaining a secondary, supportive tool to human agency.
